top_comments.comment: Contemplating is code word meaning the DOJ will do NOTHING.

comments_since_last_sample.body:

This video is an unequivocal appraisal of the ability of justice to work freely and effectively against the most powerful  in this country
Contemplating is code word meaning the DOJ will do NOTHING.
